title: Changing my name deletes my Boards!?
body:
Recently I changed my name from SoulBlazer to Sasøri. Just now I checked my Boards profile and it has been 'missing' or 'moved', is this suppose to happen or is it some kinda bug? I'm kind of worried and confused. Please let me know what this means ASAP.

**Edit:** It shows that this discussion was posted by 'SoulBlazer', again what does this mean?

replies.body: This happened to me when I changed my name actually. I seem to remember it took about a week to update on the boards. Hold tight, and let me know if this still isn't fixed by the 25th :D

Thank you for letting me know, I'll be sure to inform you if I do need help but until then I'll wait. Again, thank you as I have gotten any kind of reply in a while. :D

**Edit:** It just updated as I replied to you, lmao.
Ahah, what a coincidence XD Good to hear it's fixed though
